title: On the radio
author: VD
content_html: I almost forgot… I’ll be on the Jerry Hughes show at 2 PM Eastern today. Click here if you want to listen live. I think we’ll be taking calls if you’ve got any questions or whatever; the call-in number is 866-222-2368.
